description:
Enjoy and learn about beautiful plants and flowers from all over the world. Have fun playing a brand new set of beautiful hidden object scenes while listening to relaxing music.

- 24 chapters of nature fun!
- Over 70 total HO Scenes and Minigames!
- Fun facts about fun plants!
- Explore gorgeous, handcrafted nature scenes!
- Decorate your very own garden!
- 6 extra locations
- 12 minigames
- Additional plants and flowers
- Explore the developer's own plant children
name: Nature Escapes 3 Collector's Edition
